item.description:
A thought - want to see how much a summer's worth of consistent (sort of) riding can improve your fitness? Let's do an informal test. Come ride 30-miles on June 20th...your own pace..spend the summer getting your rides in when you can and at the end of the summer/beginning of fall, we'll do the route again...and you be the judge.

This route will take us through Sharon/Mansfield/Easton/Foxboro (click for map) - it's a pretty good distance so if you're not comfortable with 30-miles there is a 15-mile option!

No need to decide on the distance now, we'll divide into groups once we begin -- just know thyself!
item.name: Test Your Grit - 30 mile ride
